title: What Plants Teach Robotics
description: One-minute skill: What Plants Teach Robotics.

hook.text: Engineers at the Italian Institute of Technology built a robot that grows like a plant root. It's called the Plantoid.

buildup.text: The Plantoid adds 3D-printed material at its tip, navigating soil by growingâ€”just like a real root.

discovery.text: Plant-inspired robots could explore collapsed buildings, navigate rubble, or monitor soil without digging.

twist.text: Traditional robots move through space. Plant robots grow through space. The paradigm shift unlocks new possibilities.

climax.text: Plants are inspiring a new generation of soft roboticsâ€”machines that adapt by growing, not just moving.

punchline.text: The next robot revolution may grow, not walk.
